Bukky Abaniwonda, nke a na-akpọkarị Bukky Wonder, bụ onye Canada na-eme ihe nkiri onyonyo nke sitere na Naijiria.  A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri Bridges, Awkward Things About Losing Weight na The Carperdian
A mụrụ ya na Canada dị ka onye nke abụọ n'ime ezinụlọ ya na ụmụnne ise
Ọ nọrọ na nwata ya na Abuja
O nwere ụmụnne nwoke abụọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ
Ọ gara Command Day Secondary School, Abuja maka ọmụmụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere ndekọ ego na Mahadum Bowen
N'afọ 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ndu na ihe nkiri Bridges nke Rogers Ofime duziri.  Mgbe ahụ, o mere ihe nkiri onyonyo akpọrọ It's The End
N'afọ 2020, Abaniwonda duziri usoro ntanetị mbụ nke Afro-Canadian The African Family nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị mmepụta ojii niile
Ndị a gụnyere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Africa si Nigeria, Congo na Angola.
